Author: whatsYOURtruth
Text: Is your mind trying to find a reason to make you feel bad? EDs like to use situations like this to pull a power move. "See, this is what happens when you tell on me. Be quiet and let me do my thing so this doesn't happen again".   Trainers encounter clients with eating disorders quite often and know how to handle it appropriately. So, I think its very unlikely your disclosure caused this woman to drop everything and rearrange her life.
